components.description:
Santa Claus, sometimes referred to as Father Christmas, brings joy to children at Christmas time. Displayed with a beard and red festive hat.

The Santa emoji had a frown on Android 4.4, which was resolved in Android 5.0. See also: Christmas emoji list.

Note: Father Christmas has a different origin to Santa Claus but both are represented by this single emoji.
components.title: Father Christmas

description:
Santa Claus, sometimes referred to as Father Christmas, brings joy to children at Christmas time. Displayed with a beard and red festive hat.

The Santa emoji had a frown on Android 4.4, which was resolved in Android 5.0. See also: Christmas emoji list.

Note: Father Christmas has a different origin to Santa Claus but both are represented by this single emoji.
title: Father Christmas

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Celebration symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: Santa Claus, known in some countries as Father Christmas, brings joy to children at ChristmasÂ time. Married to Mrs Claus. The Santa emoji ha http://emojipedia.org/father-christmas/
emoji_net_data.name: Santa Claus

bn:00103933a: Enjoying or showing or marked by joy or pleasure

bn:13689766a: Pertaining to a feast or feast-day. (Now only as the noun used attributively.)

bn:00103500a: Full of or showing high-spirited merriment- Wordsworth

bn:00084714v: To behave as expected during holidays or rites.
Behave as expected during of holidays or rites
To honour by rites, by ceremonies of joy and respect, or by refraining from ordinary business; to observe duly; to keep.

bn:00088803v: To give a gift or presentation to (someone).
To give as a present; make a gift of.
To make a present or gift of.
Give as a present; make a gift of

bn:00018836n: Christmas is an annual commemoration of the birth of Jesus Christ and a widely observed cultural holiday, celebrated generally on December 25 by billions of people around the world.
Annual celebration commemorating the birth of Jesus.
Xmas is a common abbreviation of the word Christmas.

December 25 Quotes of the day from previous years:; 2004; 2005; 2006; 2007; 2008; 2009; 2010; 2011; 2012; 2013; 2014: Rank or add further suggestions. Ranking system: Christmas is an awfulness that compares favorably with the great London plague and fire of 1665-66. 25
A Christian holiday celebrating the birth of Christ; a quarter day in England, Wales, and Ireland
A widely celebrated festival commemorating the birth of Jesus Christ, incorporating various Christian, pre-Christian and secular customs.

bn:00033784n: A western folk legend inspired by the 4th-century saint

Santa Claus, also known as Saint Nicholas, Father Christmas, Kris Kringle and simply "Santa", is a figure with legendary, historical and folkloric origins who, in many Western cultures, is said to bring gifts to the homes of the good children on 24 December, the night before Christmas Day.
Father Christmas is the traditional British name for a figure associated with Christmas.
A mythological figure who traditionally is believed to bring presents to people (especially children) at Christmas time.
The legendary patron saint of children; an imaginary being who is thought to bring presents to children at Christmas
Historically known as Old Father Christmas, similar in concept to Santa Claus
Mythical, folkloric figure who delivers presents to kids on Christmas Eve

Santa Claus, also known as Saint Nicholas, Father Christmas, Kris Kringle, or simply "Santa", is a figure with legendary, historical and folkloric aspects who, in many western cultures, is said to bring gifts to the homes of the good children during the late evening and overnight hours of Christmas Eve, December 24. Claus

bn:00040436n: A gift is the transfer of something without the expectation of receiving something in return.
The transfer of something without the expectation of receiving something in return
Object given without the expectation of payment
A gift or a present is an item given to someone without the expectation of payment.

bn:00034150n: A day or period of time set aside for feasting and celebration

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, Santa Claus is depicted with a jolly and benevolent expression, his iconic red suit rendered with plush texture and a glossy 3D sheen that captures the magic of the holiday season. The soft white trim of his hat and beard are highlighted with realistic lighting, giving them a fluffy, inviting appearance characteristic of Apple's detailed emoji design. This universally recognized figure on Apple devices symbolizes joy, generosity, and the spirit of giving, perfectly embodying the excitement of Christmas and winter festivities.
